transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan Rakesh ji good morning.
Customer: Good morning good morning kya haal hai abhi?
Executive: Ji main badhiya hu sir aap batao aap kaise ho?
Customer: Badhiya hai badhiya hai bataiye sir.
Executive: Ji ji haan main keh raha hu wo aapka jo number aaj bata rahe the wo number block ho gaya tha na abhi?
Customer: Haan wo number block ho gaya tha.
Executive: Theek hai abhi koi call vgera uski nahi aa rahi hai na?
Customer: Nahi abhi to nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Accha haan ji wo kal aapne jo call kiya tha jis time pe sir main ghar pe tha.
Customer: Haan haan sir ye bataiye maine us din update bhi kar diya tha 2010 but wo abhi tak hua nahi usme show bhi nahi ho raha hai kyu nahi ho raha hai usme update?
Executive: Wo main abhi ek baar dekh leta hu Rakesh bhai theek hai.
Customer: Ho jana chahiye.
Executive: Ho gaya tha ek minute main dekh leta hu.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai mujhe ek baar ek thoda sa ye mujhe ye batao jo aapne jo leader ki jo aapne category change ki thi sir theek hai leader leader plus ki aur leader ki theek hai 2020 combination 40 combination total.
Customer: Haan wo hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai abhi aap batao mujhe aapne pure sahi kar diye na abhi star ko chhod do ab leader wale mujhe batao.
Customer: Star aur leader plus bache hue hai kyuki leader plus Durga mam ne kaha tha ki wo apne end se karengi.
Executive: Theek hai aap ek baar na leader mam ko bol ke mam ko bol ke aaj leader plus ke sare change karwa do star ka bhi ruk jao star Durga mam ka meeting.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai aap kar lenge koi issue nahi hai leader plus me ja ke apne aap hi wo category select karke 10 ko daal denge leader wale sahi kar diya tha.
Executive: Haan usko aaj karwa do sir kaise bhi theek hai taki hum log ispe kaam kar sake.
Customer: Aaj karwa do sir.
Executive: Kyuki hamara kya hai nuksan ho raha hai accha second cheez ek mujhe ab ye batao inquiry drop down karne ka ek reason aur aaya hai.
Customer: Haan ye jo main aapko pehle bata raha tha pehle wahi same reason ye nikal raha hai ki hamari na do buyer ki complaint thi sir theek hai.
Executive: Do buyer ne complaint kiya tha sir to do buyer ki complaint hai wahi thi to hamara jo ek tha wo to remove ho gaya tha buyer se baat karke conference call pe maine baat kiya tha sir theek hai fir maine team jo thi jo buyer jo legal team hoti hai maine unke bhi conference call pe buyer se baat karwa di thi.
Customer: To wo wali to ticket hamari close ho gayi thi sir.
Executive: Hmm buyer ki.
Customer: Theek hai aur ek abhi ticket padi hui hai sir.
Executive: Rajashri naam ki ek buyer hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm aur Rajashri wali ticket abhi tak close nahi hui hai aapke contact nahi ho pa raha hai ya kya nahi ho pa raha hai ek baar baat karo Rajashri jo buyer hai.
Executive: Theek hai main abhi baat karta hu unko kaun hai aap mere ko unka naam likh ke bhejo uska screenshot bhejo.
Customer: Maine group me bhej diya hai group me maine bhej diya hai apna hamara ek group bana hua hai waha maine Durga mam ko tag bhi kar diya hai theek hai aap ek baar unse baat kar lo inke se agar aapki baat nahi hoti hai to main jiske paas wo ticket assign hai na Krishna Chandra Yadav hai India Mart se.
Executive: Main maine unka number try kiya tha maine us time pe lekin us time pe unka number lag hi nahi raha tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai aur aaj bhi maine number try kiya aaj bhi unka number nahi lag raha hai main ek baar try karta hu unka mail vgera pe jo hamare India Mart ke hai legal team ke jinko ye aapke ticket assign hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Krishna Chandra Yadav naam hai unka haan unko maine mail abhi main unko dekhta hu number dobara try karta hu inke agar number try nahi hota hai na to main unko mail kar dunga ek baar.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ki haan ek baar wo bhi apne end se buyer se baat kar le lekin main pehle ye bolunga agar aap log buyer se pehle baat kar loge na sir to aap ye bata rahoge actually me problem kya hai sir buyer ko maal pahucha ki nahi pahucha kyuki pata lage sir Krishna Chandra Yadav call kare Rajashri ko aur Rajashri mana kar de ki nahi matlab jo bhi issue raha hoga ye apne issue bata dengi na to wo trade close nahi karenge sir to wo action le lenge.
Customer: Theek hai main karta hu baat.
Executive: Haan ye aap karwa dena immediately theek hai aur second mujhe ab ye batao abhi mam ne abhi mere ko ek GST bheja tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai GST bheja tha GST pe aap logo ka shayad jo address tha wo change hone ka jo hamara abhi pada hua hai address wo purana wala address pada hua hai.
Customer: Aur jo purana wala hamara address abhi jo GST aapko mam ne bheja hai usme updated address hoga aap ek baar check kijiye.
Executive: Haan haan matlab abhi hamara jo purana wala hai wo Kanpur road wala hai sir theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Kanpur road ka hi hai ye address hamara.
Customer: Nahi abhi jo mam ne jo naya usme address dusra hai na.
Executive: Jo usme address mention hai sir ground floor C24 transport nagar Lucknow.
Customer: Haan transport nagar wala hai haan.
Customer: Hmm yahi yahi yahi ho gaya address abhi.
Executive: Haan abhi jo mam ne bheja hai ground floor additional business address pada hua hai ye remove ho jayega abhi thode din me ye hatana hai.
Customer: Kaunsa?
Executive: Additional wala jo Piyush Tower ka likha hoga dekhiye.
Customer: Haan haan haan wahi Kanpur road wala tha wo likha haan wo pura change ho jayega abhi ab aapka address ye wala ho jayega pura main aapko bata deta hu ground floor flat number jo ho jayega C24 aur transport nagar Lucknow.
Customer: Us taraf ho gaya 226012.
Executive: Haan theek hai yahi wala theek hai ye wala apna ho jayega ye main maine basically mam ka message aaya tha usse pehle hi maine daal diya hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Accha wo bhi dekh lijiyega 2010 wala hua nahi abhi.
Customer: Kaunsa wo?
Executive: Ek minute ruko main check kar leta hu aap ruko na ek baar haan ek baar check kar leta hu aap mujhe batao aapne about usme change kiya tha na haan haan accha aapne yaha par likha tha aap isme kya change karna chahte the about usme aap ek baar 2017 se 2010 karna tha.
Executive: Establish in 2010 likha to hai sir.
Customer: Haan lekin wo update nahi hua na google pe.
Executive: Catalog open karo fir dekho establish in 2000 ye aa to gaya sir.
Customer: 2017 aa to raha hai sir dekho 2017 aa raha hai na 2010 chahiye.
Executive: Google ki baat kar rahe hai ek minute ruko aap kya hai aapko 2010 chahiye.
Customer: Lekin is tarah bol bolna kar rahe hai.
Executive: Ek minute ruko main aapko screenshot bhejta hu theek hai aapko personally bhejta hu abhi jo mere ko dikh raha hai abhi ye dikh raha hai sir theek hai aapko main pehle bhej deta hu fir aapne kya kiya wo main dekh leta hu ek baar.
Executive: Jo bhai wo dikh raha hai sir group me dekhna.
Customer: Aap bhejiye na.
Executive: Dekho ye ye wo
Executive: Ji abhi aapne bheja hua hai.
Executive: Abhi ye dikh raha hai sir theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur aapne yaha par jo seller center kiya tha I have to change ye resolution isme man lo website 2017 kar diya 2010 kar doge.
Customer: Sir abhi rok liya pura nikalne se rok liya hmm uske baad agar ek complaint bhi aati hai to download ho gaya dikha aur aapne change kiya hai wo ye kiya hai dekhna sir ek baar jab tak iski jo hai company wapas nahi wo sab baad ka process hai yaar pehle sir ruk jao thoda sa karne do bas aur ye rahega na jo aapne change kiya hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na yahi rahega na jo aapne change kiya hai ye haan haan yahi.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ab mere ko thoda time do bas theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Main aapko bhej kar karwa ke bhejta hu aapko theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Number was blocked, but now unblocked.

- 2010 update not reflected on profile.

- Leader plus category change pending.

- Inquiry drop down due to buyer complaints.

- Rajashri ticket not closed, contact issue.

- GST address on file is outdated.

- About us section shows 2017 instead of 2010.



Resolution:

- Executive will check on 2010 update.

- Executive asked customer to follow up with Durga mam.

- Executive will mail Krishna Chandra Yadav regarding Rajashri.

- Executive asked customer to talk to buyer first.

- Executive confirmed new GST address.

- Executive will send screenshot of profile.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send screenshot of profile.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- profile update, buyleads, gst, category change, address, inquiry
